data.title: William Boone
data.meta_description: Captain William Boone is the main antagonist of the 1994 film Rudyard Kipling's The Jungle Book, based on the 1967 film of the same name, which was released 28 years prior to the 1994 remake. He is a corrupt British Army captain and hunter bent on enriching himself, even willing to resort to...
